name: B&B (Beat & Brawl) (Jam Version)
description:
Become a vigilante alongside your partner in crime and give these thugs a piece of your mind in this co-op rhythm game! Beat and Brawl is a local multiplayer rhythm boss rush made for the Multiplayer Game Jam.

We were not able to finish the final stage due to the jam's time constraints. We will create an updated version of the game with all the finished features very soon!

-(DFJK) for player one (P1)
-(Left mouse button/Right mouse button) for player two (P2)


-A handcrafted experience for both challenge driven and casual audiences
-A grand and incredible soundtrack
-Charming handpixeled sprites
-Swag

Dev: Herweins https://herwe1ns.itch.io/
Artist: AcidBurritos https://acidburritos.itch.io/
Composer/SFX: King_aurorus https://kingaurorusmusic.com/
